title: Biden picks Ketanji Brown Jackson as historic U.S. Supreme Court nominee
description: President Joe Biden on Friday nominated federal appellate judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to become the first Black woman to serve on the U.S. Supreme Court, saying it was time for America's top judicial body to reflect "the full talents and greatness of our nati…
